name: Watercress
properties: Part of Daily Dozen greens and cruciferous vegetables
benefits: Watercress is a nutrient-dense cruciferous green that provides both greens and cruciferous vegetable benefits. It offers powerful antioxidants and anti-inflammatory compounds while being very low in calories and high in vitamins and minerals.
amount: Part of Daily Dozen - counts toward both greens (2 servings) and cruciferous (1 serving) daily

quotes: GREENS checkbox in Daily Dozen. CRUCIFEROUS VEGETABLES checkbox in Daily Dozen. Used in Spring Greens Soup recipes combining multiple green vegetables.
